description:
Creating an internal sales process in any size business is critical. These Sales Funnels become a part of the business process each day to ensure a constant attracting and conversion and retention of customers. 

This easy to follow and implement strategy will set your business on the right course for growth in sales and customer base. Through 3 different Sales Funnels will take your business to a new level of customer centric focus and give you the edge over your competitor.
title: How to Develop a Sales Funnel for Your Small Business
